document_data.mainbody:
Jhauntar Olmhazan was a jeweler inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Jhauntar was the spokesman for the Jewelers Guild circa the . He held the title of "Gentleman Speaker for the Jewelers" within the guild and worked out of the House of Gemsâ€”the guild headquarters located on Gem Street in the Castle Ward. Jhauntar also owned and operated Olmhazans Jewels.
